content.question: A. Compare the trend lines of sub-Saharan Africa with the world trend for the 1991 to 2019 time period. B. Explain the degree to which economic pull factors have affected agricultural employment in South Asia. C. Explain a possible limitation of the data in the graph to explain the impacts of using genetically modified organisms on the agricultural percentage of the workforce. D. Using a region on the graph, explain how the region’s changes in the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect the challenges to food security.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Explain the degree to which a geographic concept, process, model, or theory effectively explains geographic effects in different contexts and regions of the world.
